title: The endoscopy department can alert to complications associated with peripheral venous catheters in patients admitted to a tertiary teaching hospital
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): María Jesús Pérez-Granda, Francisca Guzmán Blanco, Sonia Aguado Díaz, Rosario Jiménez Bautista, Julia Orense Velilla, Juana Rodríguez Calero, María Luisa Valls, Antonio Vicente Arellano, Pilar García Santos, Patricia Munoz, María Guembe, Francisco Jesús Carrascosa Tamayo, Juliana Aguilar Vales, Beatriz Martínez Lobo, José Carlos Sánchez de la Torre, María Antonia Soto González, Rocío Barragán Lagar, Helena Gil de Vicente, María Amor Gámez, Isabel Sigüenza Atienza
